name: Out of range
description:
Try to get home to you planet by moving from satellite to satellite. But be very careful when moving outside the range of the satellites since you will lose all control over the ship!

Instructions

Move forward with the right mousebutton, aim with mouse.

R = Restart

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

All art created by me in Aseprite

Music         https://freesound.org/people/Clinthammer/sounds/179523/
Explosion     https://freesound.org/people/kutejnikov/sounds/522209/
